[00:00.00]The Business - Tiësto (铁斯托)
[00:04.17]Lyrics by：Tijs Verwest/Julia Karlsson/Anton Rundberg/James Bell
[00:08.35]Let's get down let's get down to business
[00:10.60]
[00:11.70]Give you one more night one more night to get this
[00:14.63]
[00:15.39]We've had a million million nights just like this
[00:19.31]

[00:22.72]

[00:26.50]
